name: wa-venom-bot
description: WhatsApp Bot with Venom and Google Sheets integration

scripts.install-deps: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y libatk-1.0-0 libgbm1 libx11-xcb1 libxcb1 libxcomposite1 libxdamage1 libxrandr2 libasound2 libpangocairo-1.0-0 libatk-bridge2.0-0 libcups2 libdrm2 libxfixes3 libxext6 libnss3 libxss1 libxtst6 libxshmfence1 libgtk-3-0

author: Hendra Latumeten
